front.title: Flow Handover for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: With interface multihoming, Mobile Nodes are capable of simultaneous attachment to multiple radio access networks. This enables a network node such as the Local Mobility Anchor to distribute the application traffic to interfaces that can best serve them. This document specifies a network-controlled protocol to handover application flows from one interface to another. Such control could provide better experience for end users and better traffic management for network operators.
